01h.name: CPLD RoT Release Version
01h.desc: Release Version of CPLD RoT design, read-only for external agents.

02h.name: CPLD RoT SVN
02h.desc: Release Version of CPLD RoT design, read-only for external agents.

03h.name: Platform State
03h.desc: Platform state, the following states should be enumerated

value_decode.0x01: CPLD Nios II processor waiting to start
value_decode.0x40: T-1 firmware recovery due to authentication failure
value_decode.0x46: Lockdown due to PIT L2 PCH/CPU firmware hash mismatch
value_decode.0x47: Lockdown due to PIT L2 BMC firmware hash mismatch

04h.name: Recovery count
04h.desc: Numbers of FW Recovery actions since last AC on, read-only for external agents

05h.name: Last Recovery reason
05h.desc: Value indicating last FW Recovery reason following states should be enumerated:

value_decode.0x0A: CPLD WDT expired forced active fw recovery

06h.name: Panic event count
06h.desc: Number of Panic events (T0 -> T-1 transitions) since last AC-on, read-only for external agents

07h.name: Last Panic reason
07h.desc: Value indicating last Panic reason, read-only for external agents

08h.name: Major error code
08h.desc: Value indicating major error code observed on the system. read-only for external agents

value_decode.0x03: in-band and oob update failure (BMC or PCH or CPLD)

09h.name: Minor error code
09h.desc: Value indicating minor error code observed on the system. Read-only for external agents

0x01-0x02.0x04: Active, Recovery & Staging regions authentication failure – Authentication failure all regions
0x01-0x02.0x07: AFM Active & Recovery regions authentication failure
0x01-0x02.0x08: AFM Active, Recovery & Staging regions authentication failure

0x03.0x05: Active firmware update is not allowed because the recovery region failed authentication in T-1
0x03.0x06: FW update capsule failed authentication before being promoted to recovery region

0Ah.name: UFM/Provisioning Status
0Ah.desc: Status register mask for UFM provisioning and access commands; read-only for external agents.

value_decode.Bit[7]: PIT L2 has been completed successfully

0Bh.name: UFM/Provisioning Command
0Bh.desc: Command register for UFM provisioning/access commands; read/write allowed from CPU/BMC. All non-read commands are dropped (with Command Error bit set in the status register) after UFM is locked.

0Ch.name: UFM Command Trigger
0Ch.desc: Trigger register for the command set in the previous offset.

value_decode.Bit[0]: execute command specified at 'UFM/Provisioning Command' register

10h.name: ACM Checkpoint
10h.desc: Status of ACM, write from CPU allowed only until ACM signals end of execution, write from CPU reallowed on CPU reset

11h.name: BIOS Checkpoint
11h.desc: Status of BIOS IBB/OBB, write from CPU allowed only until OBB signals end of execution, write from CPU re-allowed on CPU reset

12h.name: PCH/CPU update intent
12h.desc: Update intent from the CPU FW, read/write allowed from CPU

13h.name: BMC update intent
13h.desc: Update intent from BMC FW, read/write allowed from BMC

14h.name: PCH/CPU PFM Active SVN
14h.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

15h.name: PCH/CPU PFM Active Major Version
15h.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

16h.name: PCH/CPU PFM Active Minor Version
16h.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

17h.name: BMC PFR Active SVN
17h.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

18h.name: BMC PFM Active Major Version
18h.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

19h.name: BMC PFM Active Minor Version
19h.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

1Ah.name: PCH/CPU PFR Recovery SVN
1Ah.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

1Bh.name: PCH/CPU PFM Recovery Major Version
1Bh.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

1Ch.name: PCH/CPU PFM Recovery Minor Version
1Ch.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

1Dh.name: BMC PFR Recovery SVN
1Dh.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

1Eh.name: BMC PFM Recovery Major Version
1Eh.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

1Fh.name: BMC PFM Recovery Minor Version
1Fh.desc: Set by CPLD RoT, read-only for CPU/BMC

20h-5Fh.name: CPLD RoT Hash
20h-5Fh.desc: Reserved 64 Bytes for hash value of CPLD RoT HW + FW

60h.name: BMC Checkpoint (PFR 3.0)
60h.desc: Status of BMC, write from BMC allowed only until BMC signals boot complete, write from BMC reallowed on BMC reset

61h.name: PCH/CPU Update Intent 2
61h.desc: Update intent from PCH/CPU FW, read/write allowed from PCH/CPU

62h.name: BMC Update Intent 2
62h.desc: Update intent from BMC FW, read/write allowed from BMC, no access other Agents like PCH/CPU.

63h.name: UFM and MM[9] SBMus ownership register

value_decode.Bit[1:0]-00: Indicates that UFM ownership is free
value_decode.Bit[1:0]-01: Indicates that UFM ownership is with PCH/Host CPU0
value_decode.Bit[1:0]-11: Indicates that UFM ownership is with BMC
value_decode.Bit[3]: Ownership ID fields selection for NIOS
value_decode.Bit[3]-0: Indicates that NIOS is requesting to write to UFM ownership ID fields.
value_decode.Bit[3]-1: Indicates that NIOS is requesting to write to MM9 ownership ID fields.
value_decode.Bit[4]: Ownership ID fields selection for BMC
value_decode.Bit[4]-0: Indicates that BMC is requesting to write to UFM ownership ID fields.
value_decode.Bit[4]-1: Indicates that BMC is requesting to write to MM9 ownership ID fields.
value_decode.Bit[6:5]-00: Indicates that MM9 ownership is free
value_decode.Bit[6:5]-01: Indicates that MM9 ownership is with CPLD
value_decode.Bit[6:5]-11: Indicates that MM9 ownership is with BMC

64h.name: MB_MCTP_PCH_PACKET_AVAIL_AND_RX_PACKET_ERROR
64h.desc: MCTP PCH Packet availability and RX packet error

65h.name: MB_MCTP_BMC_PACKET_AVAIL_AND_RX_PACKET_ERROR
65h.desc: MCTP BMC Packet availability and RX packet error

66h.name: MB_MCTP_PCIE_PACKET_AVAIL_AND_RX_PACKET_ERROR
66h.desc: MCTP PCIE Packet availability and RX packet error

71h.name: RX FIFO packet read for PCH

72h.name: RX FIFO packet read for BMC

73h.name: RX FIFO packet read for PCIE
